gg.al.graphics

Class CameraLayerGroupStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • gg.al.graphics.CameraLayerGroupStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g3d.decals.GroupStrategy, com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class CameraLayerGroupStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g3d.decals.GroupStrategy, com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    Created by Thomas Neumann on 21.04.2017.
    GroupStrategy which is the exact same as CameraGroupStrategy, only setting an additional OpenGL flag.
    Additional flag is set since libGDX version 1.9.5, therefore technically @Deprecated
